item.title: Pivoting a Multi-Index Pandas DataFrame
item.description: Pandas is a popular Python library for data analysis and manipulation. It provides a powerful data structure called the DataFrame, which is similar to a table in a relational database. DataFrames can have multiple levels of index, which can make them challenging to work with.
